modelDescription: Entities are details about text that has a special meaning in a Tweet. To return this field, add tweet.fields=entities in the request's query parameter.

modelFields.description: Annotations contain details about annotations relative to the text within a Tweet.
Urls contains details about text recognized as a URL.
Hashtags contains details about text recognized as a Hashtag.
Mentions contains details about text recognized as a user mention.
Cashtags contain details about text recognized as a Cashtag.
